andromeda.why: Choosing work that fits your nature is personal alignment, not liberation/rescue.

arcturus.why: Sets a sustainable resource container—right work, clear boundaries, steady throughput.

draco.why: Early status/earning anxiety can trigger rank comparisons and correctness policing.

orion-dark.why: Chasing money as control rather than alignment—compliance-to-wealth.

orion-light.why: Discipline to pursue the work you love over short-term control/greed.

pleiades.why: Self-nourishment and pacing so the fuel for work stays healthy.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching stewardship; no formal instruction yet.

arcturus.why: Natural placement and pacing—keeps resources flowing in a clean container.

draco.why: Pressure can provoke loyalty checks or gatekeeping around access to resources.

orion-dark.why: Risk of being used/controlled through money or ‘obligations.’

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint: wait for correct invitations before committing resources.

pleiades.why: Attuned hospitality—supporting the right people at the right time.

sirius.why: Resource guardianship without explicit teaching/codification yet.

andromeda.why: Struggle with overspend/scarcity cycles is self-mastery, not rescue.

arcturus.why: Choppy regulation—budget/method swings while learning sustainable throughput.

draco.why: Stress can flip into rank posturing or access gatekeeping.

orion-dark.why: Control impulse: forcing compliance and using money to dominate when anxious.

orion-light.why: Trial by temptation: cultivate discipline so resources serve true direction.

pleiades.why: Appeasement/people-pleasing can drain resources and blur boundaries.

sirius.why: Self-forging stewardship; no royal-instruction vector yet.

andromeda.why: Stabilizing resource flows for the group is order-making, not chain-breaking.

arcturus.why: Converts raw energy into reliable systems—allocation, cadence, and safeguards.

draco.why: Success can attract clique filters on who gets funded.

orion-dark.why: Risk of ossifying ‘what works’ into doctrinal budget dogma.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-steadiness: others meet the ordeal of aligning to fair stewardship.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement ensures resourcing actually nourishes the field.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-stewardship: protocols for right use of power transmit higher order.

andromeda.why: Refuses coerced funding narratives; protects resource sovereignty under projection.

arcturus.why: Cast as ‘fix everyone’s finances’ → burnout/scapegoat when reality resists one-size fits-all.

draco.why: Authority aura invites loyalty tests and access gatekeeping.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine capture: enforcing financial compliance to preserve image/control.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—resource decisions based on principle, not flattery.

pleiades.why: Appeasement can distort allocation and drain reserves.

sirius.why: Royal instruction-by-presence: models ethical wealth use despite projections.

andromeda.why: Guards resource sovereignty; refuses capture by wealth or patronage.

arcturus.why: Elder stewardship—durable standards for generating and distributing power well.

draco.why: Legacy authority can slip into status preservation or access policing.

lyra.why: Patronage used to uplift true culture/beauty, not image.

orion-dark.why: Turning stewardship into dogma/hierarchy (empire-building through wealth).

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: disciplined courage to let wealth serve direction, not ego.

pleiades.why: Focus is stewardship integrity, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Treasury sage—teaches the law of right use of power/wealth by embodied example.
